website.title: Website Development
website.headline: Your Digital Storefront, Optimized to Convert Visitors into Revenue.
website.intro: Your digital storefront needs to be as professional as your business. I build high-performance websites that convert visitors into clients.

item1.title: Tailored Design

item2.title: Responsive Design

item3.title: SEO Optimized

business.title: AI & Automation
business.headline: Stop Guessing. Build Custom Systems for Guaranteed Efficiency.
business.intro: I eliminate bottlenecks by designing and implementing bespoke automation and AI solutions that seamlessly integrate with your existing software and workflows.

item1.title: Workflow Optimization
item1.desc: Identify, analyze, and automate repetitive administrative tasks to maximize team productivity.

item2.title: Custom AI Solutions
item2.desc: Bespoke machine learning and AI tools, to provide competitive intelligence and insights..

item3.title: Digital Strategy Consulting
item3.desc: Expert analysis of your current IT infrastructure to implement scalable, future-proof, and secure digital architecture.

tech.title: Aerial Robotics & R&D
tech.headline: From Concept to Deployment. Specializing in Swarms and High-Stakes R&D.
tech.intro: I provide specialized consulting and custom engineering for complex autonomous systems, focusing on robust swarm behavior, infrastructureless operations, and securing critical project funding.

item1.title: Swarm Intelligence
item1.desc: Custom-designed algorithms for ultra-reliable flight path optimization and complex, collision-free coordination.

item2.title: Decentralized Control Systems
item2.desc: Design and implementation of distributed guidance protocols and tactical conflict management solutions for complex airspace operations.

item3.title: R&D Proposal Strategy
item3.desc: Secure high-value grants and funding with expert, PhD-level technical contribution and writing.

bio.p1: I am Dr. Jamie Wubben. I operate at the intersection of deep tech and strategic management.
bio.p2: With a PhD in Informatics, I spent years solving the hardest problems in robotics: how to make swarms of drones coordinate autonomously in unpredictable environments. Today, I apply that same rigor to business automation.
bio.p3: Whether I am writing algorithms for aerial missions or designing an AI workflow for a local business, my focus is the same: Efficiency, Resilience, and Intelligence.

ContactPage.title: Let's Optimize.
ContactPage.subtitle: Based in Belgium, working globally. I am available for freelance consulting, technical writing, and automation projects.
